infiniteLoop.iterations: Your code executed {{count}} loop iterations and was automatically stopped.
infiniteLoop.timeout: Your code ran for too long and was automatically stopped.
infiniteLoop.title: Infinite Loop Detected
infiniteLoop.hint: This happens when you have a loop that never ends:
infiniteLoop.warning: Code execution was stopped due to infinite loop

setRotation.tooltip: Sets the rotation of the specified servo to the given angle.

setOscillator.tooltip: Sets the oscillator parameters of the specified servo.

sleep.tooltip: Pauses the program for the specified number of seconds.

codeRunner.error: An error occurred during code execution

modelSelection.caption: Choose a robot
modelSelection.title: Pick your EDMO model
modelSelection.description: Select the EDMO robot you are building so the simulator and custom blocks match your hardware.
modelSelection.noModels: There are no robot configurations available right now.

mobileWarning.title: Screen Too Small
mobileWarning.message: This application requires a larger screen to function properly.
mobileWarning.hint: Please use a device with a larger screen, such as a desktop computer, laptop, or tablet in landscape mode.
